title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\Connection\V1\CloudResourceProperties
name: CloudResourceProperties
description:
Container for connection properties for delegation of access to GCP resources.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.bigquery.connection.v1.CloudResourceProperties

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.service_account_id
params.description: Output only. The account ID of the service created for the purpose of this connection. The service account does not have any permissions associated with it when it is created. After creation, customers delegate permissions to the service account. When the connection is used in the context of an operation in BigQuery, the service account will be used to connect to the desired resources in GCP. The account ID is in the form of: @gcp-sa-bigquery-cloudresource.iam.gserviceaccount.com

methods.name: getServiceAccountId
methods.description:
Output only. The account ID of the service created for the purpose of this connection.

The service account does not have any permissions associated with it when it is created. After creation, customers delegate permissions to the service account. When the connection is used in the context of an operation in BigQuery, the service account will be used to connect to the desired resources in GCP. The account ID is in the form of:

@gcp-sa-bigquery-cloudresource.iam.gserviceaccount.com Generated from protobuf field string service_account_id = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OUTPUT_ONLY];
